channel.title: LOL Silly Jagex read
channel.description:
I was bored and just bought membership so i was reading through my email about it and i was bored in school so i replyed to the email with
Please stop hacking my runescape account Pl0x
too my surprise they emailed back heres our entire email conversation ME Please stop hacking my runescape account Pl0x Response Hi there,
Thank you for contacting RuneScape Billing Support.
We do not "hack" our own players accounts. If you forgive me for saying, but that would not benefit us at all.
To prevent your account from being hijacked, please follow the security information provided on our website http://runescape.com.
To find this information please select "Safety & Security guidelines" followed by "Security Information".
I hope this resolves your query.
Kind regards, Mod Michelle
ME Hmm likly story but i have a feeling andrew gower is a Cuban spy attempting to overthrow the US goverment while listening to emo music and only i know his secret plan so he is going to hack my runescape account
Response Hi there,
Thank you for contacting RuneScape Billing Support.
You missed out the part where he was going to overthrow the US government from the UK, as that is where our office is And now that I know this plan also.....
In all seriousness though, please only email us if you have a billing related question. Perhaps some of the players who read the forums can play along with your story.
I hope this resolves your query.
Kind regards, Mod Michelle RuneScape Billing Support
Me Story you think this is mere childs play i am writing a letter to the goverment about your secret plan to overthrow our american democracy and replace it with a cuban fascist goverment
Response Hi there,
Thank you for contacting RuneScape Billing Support.
The Cubans are actually left wing, and so are not fascist. But that is besides the point.
As much as I enjoy reading your emails I am afraid that they are preventing me from answering proper queries and so I must ask you to stop sending me these emails unless you have a valid, billing related question.
ME AHHA I SEE EVIL ANDREW HAS YOU STUDYING THE CUBANS
Response Hi there,
Thank you for contacting RuneScape Billing Support.
I'm sorry to inform you but I'm forced to give your account a three day ban
Me SHIT

item.title: LOL Silly Jagex read
item.dc:creator: @Cheatest Cheatest
item.description:
@Cheatest wrote:

lmao owned!![br][size=1]Posted at: November 08, 2006, 02:44:41 PM[/size][hr][quote=“PaulT, post:17, topic:23093”][quote author=Javacisnotrecognized link=topic=35220.msg421672#msg421672 date=1162990794]

Hey, with 50-100 million a year and almost no production expenses and very little server costs, I bet they can hire some fucking hotties.

32…million…per…year…

And when you say “fucking hotties”, do you use the word “fucking” as exclamatory or literally?

I wonder if they’ll hire me…
[/quote]

32 Million is Andrews personal take after taxes.[/quote]

Actually its not, 900,000 * 5 = 4,500,000 * 12= 49,000,000
Then you pay for runescape to be hosted which would prolly cost a shit load then pay for staff. each staff gets an average of 24,000 a year there is like 140 staff or some crp like that.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @lilcheeto1 lilcheeto1
item.description:
@lilcheeto1 wrote:

Heres the first email not from runescape but from worldpay where i got jagexs email then email jagex and for you people who dont beleavie me fuck off

Heres email without transation info
If you have a query about your order

This confirmation only indicates that your transaction has been processed successfully. It does not indicate that your order has been accepted. It is the responsibility of Jagex Limited t/as Runescape to confirm that your order has been accepted, and to deliver any goods or services you have ordered.

If you have any questions about your order (including refunds, delivery status, wanting to cancel your order), please email Jagex Limited t/as Runescape at: billingsupport@jagex.com, with the transaction details listed above.
Thank you for shopping with Jagex Limited t/as Runescape
Your transaction has been processed by WorldPay on behalf of Jagex Limited t/as Runescape.

Other queries about your transaction? Visit: http://support.worldpay.com/shopper/

@Rictoo wrote:

[quote=“blacker, post:6, topic:23093”]Maybe he meant message his message center?

DEFEND THE TOPIC!DEFEND THE TOPIC![/quote]

No, because even ‘Mod Michelle’ said the word email

In all seriousness though, please only [b]email[/b] us if you have a billing related question. Perhaps some of the players who read the forums can play along with your story.
As much as I enjoy reading your [b]emails[/b] I am afraid that they are preventing me from answering proper queries and so I must ask you to stop sending me these [b]emails[/b] unless you have a valid, billing related question.

And anyway, Jagex wouldn’t refer to their site as

...please follow the security information provided on our website [b]http://runescape.com.[/b]
But as http://www.runescape.com ;)
